settings.title: Submit New Listing
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, submit, new, listings
settings.description: Select all groups allowed to submit new listings.
settings.name: addnewaccess

settings.title: Moderate new listing
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, moderation, moderate, hold, approve, listings, unpublished, unpublish
settings.description: Each group has to be selected separately. Admin must approve and publish new items for the selected groups.
settings.name: moderation_item

settings.title: Moderate edited listing
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, moderation, moderate, hold, approve, listings, edit, unpublished, unpublish
settings.description: Listings will be unpublished and held for approval when edited via the frontend.
settings.name: moderation_item_edit

settings.title: Edit listing
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, listings, edit
settings.description: Registered and Author can only edit their own listings. Editor and above can edit all listings, but only see custom fields for which they have access.
settings.name: editaccess

settings.title: Publish/unpublish listing
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, listings, publish, unpublish
settings.description: Registered and Author can only publish/unpublish their own listings.
settings.name: listing_publish_access

settings.title: Delete listing
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, listings, delete
settings.description: Registered and Author can only delete their own listings.
settings.name: listing_delete_access

settings.title: WYSIWYG editor
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, listings, editor, wysiwyg
settings.description: Used in standard fields summary and description.
settings.name: addnewwysiwyg

settings.title: Meta data fields
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, listings, editor, meta, keywords, description
settings.description: Listing description and keywords meta data.
settings.name: addnewmeta

settings.title: Submit new review
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, review, submit, new
settings.description: Select all groups allowed to submit new reviews.
settings.name: addnewaccess_reviews

settings.title: Moderate new user reviews
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, moderation, moderate, hold, approve, user, review, unpublished, unpublish
settings.description: Each group has to be selected separately. Admin must approve and publish new items for the selected groups.
settings.name: moderation_reviews

settings.title: Moderate new editor reviews
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, moderation, moderate, hold, approve, user, review, unpublished, unpublish
settings.description: Define JReviews editors in Configuration => Reviews tab.
settings.name: moderation_editor_reviews

settings.title: Moderate edited user reviews
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, moderation, moderate, hold, approve, user, review, edit
settings.description: User reviews will be unpublished and held for approval when edited via the frontend.
settings.name: moderation_review_edit

settings.title: Moderate edited user reviews
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, moderation, moderate, hold, approve, editor, review, edit
settings.description: Editor reviews will be unpublished and held for approval when edited via the frontend.
settings.name: moderation_editor_review_edit

settings.title: Enable voting
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, review, votes, voting, likes, helpful
settings.name: user_vote_public

settings.title: Edit review
settings.keywords: access, permissions, groups, roles, review, edit
settings.description: Registered and Author can only edit their own reviews.
settings.name: editaccess_reviews
